wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Louis McIntosh Johnson (12 June 1931 – 14 December 2012) was a journalist and economist.

response: On 2 August 1924, Robbins married Iris Elizabeth Harris Gardiner, one of the daughters of the journalist and editor Alfred George Gardiner. They had a daughter and a son; Ann and Richard. His daughter married Christopher Louis McIntosh Johnson in 1958. His son was an artist and sculptor; the LSE has a bust of Lionel Robbins which was made by his son.
*Christopher Louis McIntosh Johnson (1931–2012), British journalist and economist

Donald Johnson was married twice and fathered three children, two boys and a girl (Carol). One of his sons was Christopher Louis McIntosh Johnson. His second wife, Betty, whom he met at the Marlborough Arms (see below), died in 1979.
